Reviews.Title: cheap camera
Reviews.Author: chet smith
Reviews.Content: I thought I had bought an eight camera DVR I got 7 working cameras and an 8th not so good. so it set up alright but if you have an average size house you will need some longer cables to get the farther away cameras (dont understand why they all need to be 60ft. they could very them a couple at 25ft and a couple at 75 would be a better match). It struggles at night if a crook comes up to the camera and hits it directly with a flashlight light takes a few seconds to refocus and have a describable pic.  unfortunately there is no fan for the hard drive within the unit so your hard drive may get hot if you place the DVR within an inclosed area.

Reviews.Title: complicated
Reviews.Author: Burt47
Reviews.Content: This is a good system, It took a long time to figure it out but it works. My neighbor bought one too and his did not record.  I think he sent his back..He had the one with a silver face, mine has a black face on it.
